Package ohos.net

Class NetSpecifier.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.net.NetSpecifier.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    NetSpecifier

    public static class NetSpecifier.Builder
extends Object
    Builder used to create NetSpecifier objects. Specify the Network features needed in terms of NetCapabilities features
    Since:
    1

    • Method Detail

      • build

        public NetSpecifier build​()
        Creates a ohos.net.NetSpecifier object.

        Parameters of the NetSpecifier object are set based on the Builder class.

        Returns:
        Returns a NetSpecifier object.
        Since:
        1

      • clearCapabilities

        public NetSpecifier.Builder clearCapabilities​()
        clear capablitities value.
        Returns:
        Returns the NetSpecifier.Builder object.
        Since:
        1

      • addCapability

        public NetSpecifier.Builder addCapability​(int capability)
        Adds a network capability to a NetCapabilities object.

        The following capabilities are available. For details, see NetCapabilities.

        • NetCapabilities.NET_CAPABILITY_MMS
        • NetCapabilities.NET_CAPABILITY_SUPL
        • NetCapabilities.NET_CAPABILITY_DUN
        • NetCapabilities.NET_CAPABILITY_FOTA
        • NetCapabilities.NET_CAPABILITY_IMS
        • NetCapabilities.NET_CAPABILITY_CBS
        • NetCapabilities.NET_CAPABILITY_WIFI_P2P
        • NetCapabilities.NET_CAPABILITY_IA
        • NetCapabilities.NET_CAPABILITY_RCS
        • NetCapabilities.NET_CAPABILITY_XCAP
        • NetCapabilities.NET_CAPABILITY_EIMS
        • NetCapabilities.NET_CAPABILITY_NOT_METERED
        • NetCapabilities.NET_CAPABILITY_INTERNET
        • NetCapabilities.NET_CAPABILITY_NOT_RESTRICTED
        • NetCapabilities.NET_CAPABILITY_TRUSTED
        • NetCapabilities.NET_CAPABILITY_NOT_VPN
        • NetCapabilities.NET_CAPABILITY_VALIDATED
        • NetCapabilities.NET_CAPABILITY_CAPTIVE_PORTAL
        • NetCapabilities.NET_CAPABILITY_NOT_ROAMING
        • NetCapabilities.NET_CAPABILITY_FOREGROUND
        • NetCapabilities.NET_CAPABILITY_NOT_CONGESTED
        • NetCapabilities.NET_CAPABILITY_NOT_SUSPENDED
        • NetCapabilities.NET_CAPABILITY_MCX
        • NetCapabilities.NET_CAPABILITY_BIP0
        • NetCapabilities.NET_CAPABILITY_BIP1
        • NetCapabilities.NET_CAPABILITY_BIP2
        • NetCapabilities.NET_CAPABILITY_BIP3
        • NetCapabilities.NET_CAPABILITY_BIP4
        • NetCapabilities.NET_CAPABILITY_BIP5
        • NetCapabilities.NET_CAPABILITY_BIP6
        Parameters:
        capability - Indicates the network capability to be added.
        Returns:
        Returns the NetSpecifier.Builder object.
        Since:
        1

      • addBearer

        public NetSpecifier.Builder addBearer​(int bearer)
        Adds a network transmission type.

        The following types are available. For details, see NetCapabilities.

        • NetCapabilities.BEARER_CELLULAR
        • NetCapabilities.BEARER_WIFI
        • NetCapabilities.BEARER_BLUETOOTH
        • NetCapabilities.BEARER_ETHERNET
        • NetCapabilities.BEARER_VPN
        • NetCapabilities.BEARER_WIFI_AWARE
        • NetCapabilities.BEARER_LOWPAN
        Parameters:
        bearer - Indicates the network transmission type to be added.
        Returns:
        Returns the NetSpecifier.Builder object.
        Since:
        1

      • removeBearer

        public NetSpecifier.Builder removeBearer​(int bearer)
        Deletes a network bearer type.

        The following types are available. For details, see NetCapabilities.

        • NetCapabilities.BEARER_CELLULAR
        • NetCapabilities.BEARER_WIFI
        • NetCapabilities.BEARER_BLUETOOTH
        • NetCapabilities.BEARER_ETHERNET
        • NetCapabilities.BEARER_VPN
        • NetCapabilities.BEARER_WIFI_AWARE
        • NetCapabilities.BEARER_LOWPAN
        Parameters:
        bearer - Indicates the network transmission type to be deleted.
        Returns:
        Returns the NetSpecifier.Builder object.
        Since:
        1

      • setBearerPrivateIdentifier

        public NetSpecifier.Builder setBearerPrivateIdentifier​(String bearerPrivateIdentifier)
        Sets an optional parameter of a bearer network. For the cellular network, the parameter can be the SN of the primary or secondary SIM card or the carrier SPN. For the Bluetooth network, the parameter can be the device ID. For the Wi-Fi network, the parameter can be the SSID or BSSID.
        Parameters:
        bearerPrivateIdentifier - Indicates a customized optional parameter.
        Returns:
        Returns the NetSpecifier.Builder object.
        Since:
        1
